lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova will appeal a two-year ban for doping imposed by the International Tennis Federation on Wednesday, she said on her Facebook page.

headline.print_headline: Maria Sharapova Says Will Appeal Tennis Ban Imposed for Doping
headline.main: Maria Sharapova Says Will Appeal Tennis Ban Imposed for Doping

snippet: Maria Sharapova will appeal a two-year ban for doping imposed by the International Tennis Federation on Wednesday, she said on her Facebook page....
